price: 82.usun (Nabii Saalic mara kinnuk) qaleela urak (orak) Qarwa cddc haysitak sugen, is keenil taddigilleemik amaanah anuk.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
